      • openConnection

        public void openConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> connectParameters)
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Find a receiver address by means of a RoutingLogic, establish a connection by adding a route to this receiver and inform the receiver about the "connect requestor" (i.e. the sender).
        Specified by:
        openConnection in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that request the connection
        connectParameters - criteria for the RoutingLogic to find the proper receiver

      • send

        public void send(ModelAddress sender,
        EventMessage message)
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Send the give EventMessage to all currently connected receivers of the given sender.
        Specified by:
        send in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that sends the EventMessage
        message - an EventMessage

                   ModelAddress receiver)
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Close the connection to a specific receiver.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that wants to close the connection
        receiver - ModelAddress that shall be informed about the closing of the connection

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Start switching and accept "open", "send" and "close" requests. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods before starting will result in an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Switchboard

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Disconnect all addresses and stop switching. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods after stopping will result in an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Switchboard
